statements: UPDATE WildlifeData SET population = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WildlifeData SET conservation_status = 'Endangered', population = 1000 WHERE species = 'Tiger';
UPDATE WildlifeData SET population = 200, conservation_status = 'Endangered' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE WildlifeData SET location = 'Central Park', population = 1500 WHERE species = 'Red Fox'
UPDATE Wildlifepopulations SET conservation_status = 'Endangered' WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE ConservationEfforts SET success_rate = 0.75, action_taken = 'Increase patrolling' WHERE location = 'Serengeti National Park';
UPDATE Wildlifepopulations SET population_size = 1000, conservation_status = 'Endangered' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ConservationEfforts SET success_rate = 75.50, action_taken = 'Habitat Restoration', location = 'National Park' WHERE species_name = 'Lion';
UPDATE WildlifePopulation SET location='Forest' WHERE species='Tiger'
UPDATE ConservationEfforts SET budget=50000.00, start_date='2023-01-01' WHERE conservation_org='SaveTheTigers'
UPDATE WildlifePopulation SET population = 500, last_observation_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE species = 'Lion' AND location = 'Serengeti National Park';
UPDATE PopulationAnalysis SET analyst = 'Dr. Smith', analysis_date = '2023-10-10' WHERE analysis_id = 123;
UPDATE species SET species_name = 'Lion', species_category = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE conservation_efforts SET conservation_measure = 'Habitat Restoration', conservation_effectiveness = 'High' WHERE species_id = 2;
UPDATE species SET species_name = 'Bald Eagle', species_category = 'Birds' WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE population_data SET population_count = 5000, year = 2023 WHERE data_id = 2;
UPDATE animal_data SET population_count = population_count + 100 WHERE species = 'Elephant';
UPDATE conservation_projects SET budget = 20000.50, lead_organization = 'Wildlife Conservation Society' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE animal_data SET population_count = 500, conservation_status = 'Endangered' WHERE animal_id = 101
UPDATE research_scientists SET organization = 'Wildlife Conservation Society', expertise_area = 'Ecology' WHERE scientist_id = 201
